title: Having Problem
body:
HI 
I m Prince.I m in lvl 30 but in the website It's shows me i m lvl 10. 
Why it's happening????
and my another problem is Login. I can't login my account i facing lot's of   problem. 
It say **"unable to login an unknown Error"**

So What i need to  do to solve the Problem

replies.body:
Your Boards and Summoner profiles generally won't sync until after you've tried posting. It looks like they have now synced since you show as level 30 to me. 

Login issues can be caused by any number of potential factors, but [our fix guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) goes over the most common solutions for this.

Should you continue to have login issues after working through those steps, please get back to me.
i  all ready have done that but still i m facing some log in problem view the  [video](https://youtu.be/PBCj2ea3jX8) pleas help me

Thanks for the video. It seems there may be some local or network routing issues that could be causing the issue. Since the guide I linked didn;t resolve the problem, I encourage you to reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach them to your request, it will give our specialists with the right information to resolve the issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
